headline: How Will Fortive's (FTV) Operational Streamlining and Share Buybacks Shape Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Fortive Corporation reported third quarter 2025 results showing revenue of US$1,027.1 million and net income of US$55 million, while also highlighting operational streamlining efforts and continued innovation in core business units following the Ralliance spin-off. The company announced a US$0.0600 per share quarterly dividend and signaled a commitment to smaller bolt-on acquisitions, alongside a substantial share repurchase program that bought back over 10.96 million shares for US$528.36...
